mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID , MEM_PW , MEM_NAME , GENDER , TO_CHAR(BIRTH_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BIRTH_DATE , COUNTRY_NAME , CO.COUNTRY_CODE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_PHONE , POINTS , MEM_ADDR , EMP_CODE FROM AIR_MEMBER MEM, COUNTRY CO WHERE MEM.COUNTRY_CODE = CO.COUNTRY_CODE AND MEM_ID=#{memId}

SELECT MEM_ID , MEM_PW , MEM_NAME , GENDER , BIRTH_DATE , COUNTRY_CODE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_PHONE , POINTS , MEM_ADDR , EMP_CODE , IS_ADMIN FROM AIR_MEMBER WHERE 1 = 1
AND MEM_ID = #{memId}
mapper.update: UPDATE AIR_MEMBER SET MEM_PW =#{memPw} WHERE MEM_ID=#{memId}
mapper.select: SELECT SIDE_MENU_CODE , SIDE_MENU_NAME , SIDE_MENU_URI FROM MEM_SIDE_MENU ORDER BY SIDE_MENU_CODE
